meanings: in vain, uselessly, needlessly, fruitlessly, pointlessly, gratuitously, without reason[ground], for nothing, to no purpose
fight for no reason at all
tell a lie gratuitously[to no purpose]

vlive.korean: [괜히 진 기분22] 오늘 학부모 총회 이런 거 아니야? [They feel like they lost again 22] Is it like a parents' conference today? 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 23. 현재 1위 츄플에게 도전하는 경희대 래빈 & 용인 리퍼블릭!
vlive.english: [They feel like they lost again 22] Is it like a parents' conference today?

examples.korean: Freshman 15: this is no myth; I’m living proof. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 대학 들어가면 살찐다더니. 괜히 하는 얘기가 아니었어. 내가 살아 있는 증거야. DARAKWON

examples.korean: I've always followed my father's advice: he told me, first to always keep my word and, second, to never insult anybody unintentionally. If I insult you, you can be goddamn sure I intend to. And, third, he told me not to go around looking for trouble. (John Wayne) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 난 항상 아버지의 조언을 따랐다. 첫째, 언행을 일치시켜라. 둘째, 무심코 상대방을 모욕하지 말라. 그러므로 내가 누군가를 모욕할 때, 그것은 분명 의도적인 것이다. 셋째, 괜히 시비거리를 찾아다니지 말라. (존 웨인, 공부명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: I've always followed my father's advice: he told me, first to always keep my word and, second, to never insult anybody unintentionally. If I insult you, you can be goddamn sure I intend to. And, third, he told me not to go around looking for trouble. (John Wayne) Add to Wordbook
